titles.title: Congratulating Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons for their outstanding achievements in the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympic Games.
Congratulating Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons for their outstanding achievements in the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympic Games.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Honors the accomplishments and Olympic achievements of Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons.
